relation: Exfoliating and conditioning dry lips before lipstick application, or as a balm on its own.
Leaves little black bits on your lips, which makes it look like you've just devoured a top-soil sandwich.
Prep + Prime leaves lips smooth, plump, and silky.
An overnight treatment for parched, flaky lips.
A little bit goes a long way.
Leaves sticky sugar particles on your fingers, necessitating paw wipeage.
Tx Lips exfoliates the worst of the flaky lips, but it's not as moisturizing.
Leaf and Rusher. Love ya, Chicago, but... it's Brad Pitt.
It's a draw. MAC's packaging is neater, but Tx Lips lasts forever.
Leaf and Rusher. At least sugar crystals are clear.
pageTitle: Battle of the Lip Exfoliators: MAC vs Leaf and Rusher | POPSUGAR Beauty
textBeforeTable: . Pretty lips are healthy lips, but most people deal with the occasional bout of chapped lips. When Chapstick isn't enough to smooth your lips, they simply need good exfoliation. You can use a warm, damp washcloth to scrub away dry skin, but when you're away from home, turn to a lip exfoliator to get rid of the flakies. I've compared two of my favorites, MAC Prep + Prime Microfine Lip Refinisher and Leaf and Rusher Tx Lips.
